img_text: RI 'KE-11 43% 13:02 <- Inbox MORTAL1KOMBAT YOU HAVE BEEN SELECTED Congratulations DatBoiChaz, We are pleased to invite you to the Online Stress test, available now through March 17th only! Here is your PS4 code: 9L3X-7QN4-JHB5 The Online Stress Test goal is to test matchmaking in a live environment and ensure that Closed Beta and Launch services run as smoothly as possible This event will feature only several characters and modes available at launch. Online availability is not guaranteed and your participation is subject to the Beta Agreement you've confirmed upon registration. See you in the arena!
